armour.translation[0].definitions[0].def: metal or leather clothing that protects your body, worn by soldiers in battles in past times
armour.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a knight wearing a suit of armour
armour.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a strong metal layer that protects military vehicles
armour.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a strong layer or shell that protects some plants and animals
